website_summaries.verdict: Produced and packaged in the USA and beneficial for conditions from ordinary dryness to psoriasis.
pros: Works great as a cleanser and moisturizer
Ideal for conditioning hands and nails
Reviews suggest it soaks into skin better than other oils including coconut and argan oils
We love the infusion of natural ingredients
cons: On the thicker side in terms of oil texture

customer_reviews.title: The Best hand down!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got bit by a pitbull Black Friday last year. Decided to try this Oil, best decision I ever made. The picture does all the talking.
customer_reviews.author: Schang

customer_reviews.title: Seems fishy
customer_reviews.text: the thing that i didn’t like about this product is that there’s no listing of ingredients and/or supplement facts on the box or bottle itself. That seemed a little fishy to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ziyadah Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used pure vitamin e with no problems before. This brand broke my skin out and burns. Why does it burn????
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this oil... it smells wonderful and it nice and light... but my skin did NOT like it.. I purchased it hoping it would hydrate my dry skin... but it did not help. That being said, I reached out to Leven Rose and told them and requested a suggestion on what else I could try for hydration- and they immediately offered me a refund on the serum and offered to send me a bottle of another oil to try. I refused the refund and accepted the other oil. Happily the oil they suggested and sent really does work! For customer service alone Leven Rose gets 5 stars. They went above and beyond!
customer_reviews.author: MERE

customer_reviews.title: I loved it at first but long term use caused dry skin
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE** I stopped using this product because after daily use for about 1 month, my face started drying up and peeling. I had changed nothing else to my routine. Once I stopped this product, the dryness went away. Do not use it daily if you don't want dry skin. I've been looking for something to use constantly on my face. This oil smells heavenly. You can truly smell the rose and it comes in a decent size. I feel like some of my scars from popped pimples have disappeared. I've also noticed my lashes getting longer. I'll be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful oil with gorgeous light rose scent
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a lovely blend of oils for skin! It goes on smoothly and absorbs well. Jojoba is the oil that is most similar to our skin’s sebum, and it’s very nourishing and gentle. Leven Rose has blended it with some other wonderful oils. It has an amazing light rose scent—not overpowering though. I washed my face and used about 6-7 drops. Went to bed and enjoyed falling asleep to the delicate rose scent. Fabulous customer service too. They even sent a coupon for a free bottle!! Buy this and encourage this kind of quality product and company 😀
customer_reviews.author: Kim Meendering

customer_reviews.title: broke me out and smelled bad
customer_reviews.text: This made my skin out immediately and consistently. It smells very strong so it could be scent irritant. I have since learned to get skincare from established companies (like The Ordinary). I used this as a facial oil to get all the makeup off followed by a cleanser and then moisturizer. I have since switched to argan oil and have heard that's fine, also heard that jojoba works well. You can feel the other stuff clogging your pores whereas argan oil feels nice to me. Now only use this product for nailbeds
customer_reviews.author: AllNotesBend

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like how watery the product is and that it's mixed with 8 other oils. I'm not happy with the quality nor the results; I saw no significant difference in using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Oudree Ellis-Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Not just a facial serum
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on my legs after shaving because my legs were overdry. Gently dried legs, then immediately rubbed in oil. Love it. Moisturizes nicely and absorbs so as to not leave any oilslick. Recently have had issues with allergic reactions to insect bites and essential oils. Vitamin E serum reduces the itchiness and moisturizes in the process. Scent is light and pleasant, quickly dissipates.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Made my face breakout
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this but unfortunately it makes my face breakout. I'm not sure what oil in it my skin doesn't agree with but one of them I don't tolerate well and end up with pimples. Sadly I wasted my money trying this as I don't see a return option for after trying the product.
customer_reviews.author: gadunn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I use this at night on my face, alternating with other face products. My head was itching, just dry skin, put some on my fingertips and rubbed on places of scalp where I needed it. No more itching. Did not have to wash hair, as my hair shined and having natural curly hair (not tight curls, soft and curly) I rub it on my hands and nails. Read the label for a lot of uses.
customer_reviews.author: My Little Pony Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and this product made my skin even more oily even after washing after application, So I had to stop using it after one or two applications. However, I like the scent of it, its very pleasant
customer_reviews.author: rajitha

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning and every night on my nails. It's only been a few weeks but my nails are stronger! I also use it for my eczema on my hands and noticed a huge difference in a matter of days!! I will definitely buying this again when my supply runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have severe eczema and have had dry patches all over my body for months now...in just two days this has moisturized my skin without giving it an oily appearance. The flakes are gone, and it didn’t sting at all either (most products do because of my sensitivity). Excellent customer service as well—the seller reached out to me to ask if I had received it on time and how it worked for me. Definitely worth a try if you have eczema/psoriasis/etc. or dry and sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great product to use with lotion or hair/scalp massage.
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this product. Used I initially for my skin during pregnancy. It could be all in my mind but when I put this on along with lotion (as the lotion itself was not cutting it anymore), the itching subsided and my skin was very soft. Now with the dry cold weather I am using this before a shower and massaging with castor oil. End result, super smooth and non frizz hair. 😍
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing- feels healthy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Vit E oil for my curly hair, for growth and moisture. I have found out, in a short time, that its good to add to lotions, to put on hands, feet, and all of the body hair... etc. Mixed with vitamin C it has really good affects as well. I really recommend this product. It is a little thick, I’d say medium , but it doesn’t leave a residue on things and it doesnt feel thick. It feels natural and soft. I would recommend not putting it on before you have to deal with dishes in the kitchen, as it’s slippery in water. I learned that the hard way :)
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service... Glass bottle, reached in good shape... The oil smells amazing! Just started using it so can’t say much about how good it is but if it’s regular vitamin e oil, it’ll be good, that’s a no brainer...anyone expecting wonders to happen needs more than vitamin e oil....it’s not the oil’s fault, your skin just needs more than that. I am not expecting wonders to happen but it’s a great moisturizer for dry skin like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Irene G

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend for Face, Scalp, Hair, Skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my face, beard, and hair/scalp. I was having dry spots on my face near my nose, and this vitamin E serum helped tremendously. I have sensitive skin so I am relieved to have found something that "moisturizes my situation" without having my skin break out. Additionally, this works well for my hair and scalp. My barber noticed that my hair felt soft and asked what I did differently, and I mentioned this Vitamin E Serum. I am a man of color and recommend this for face/hair care.
customer_reviews.author: ShowTime2pt0

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin E Serum
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I have ever used. Bought it for age related dark spots which it works well for me. I used it on my toes and feet. My toes and toenails seemed very dry and cracked for years. I used this product a few drops to moisten them and within a few weeks my feet looked like they did 40 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Love this product !
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I have combination skin and this helps my skin feel moisturized and smooth. It lets my makeup sit good on my face and doesn’t leave my face looking oily or greasy later on in the day. I will definitely be getting more of this product. I didn’t think the smell was over whelming at all like some of the negative ratings and comments. It has a nice fragrance but I didn’t think it was overwhelming at all. And I get migraines all the time.
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably softer skin!
customer_reviews.text: Clearly felt the difference in this pleasant smelling oil. It is for the entire body and best used out of the shower whilst skin is still moist. It helps your skin to feel soft and supple while looking radiant! Can be used alone and even blended in lotions ( I did this for my husband , since he is too manly to use girly oils alone) Purchased also as a gift for my senior mom who reports back ...excellent results! Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline a nagy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the face!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third bottle. I used it as a facial serum for first 30 days mixed in with my regular facial moisturizer at night and wow did my skin and eyebrows improve immensely. I am so pleased; My skin is so much softer. During the day it mixes well with my moisturizing sunscreen and wears well under my primer and makeup. My skin is now so very, very soft!
customer_reviews.author: Seara

customer_reviews.title: My New Fave Serum
customer_reviews.text: I had been cutting open vitamin E capsules to apply to a healing surgical incision, and it was getting a little tedious. I found this product on Amazon. Tons of positive reviews - well deserved. Smells great, nice viscosity, and very moisturizing. I’ll soon expand my use of it from elbows and knees to throat and maybe face. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: LKS

customer_reviews.title: Not very pure oil!
customer_reviews.text: I have used pure vitamin E oil! It should be very thick! And we can see the difference on the next day itself! I didn’t see any results even for a week! It’s not worth to buy! Not a good texture
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great, amazing correspondence & service this company gave me. They seem to genuinely care about consumer concerns & questions. As usual, the oil color is impressively vibrant as was the Jojoba oil! I just hope that the cold pressed oil is all natural and not tainted with a dye to have such a fresh looking, aesthetic glow to it.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I really love this oil. At first, I thought the smell was a bit overpowering, but I've come to like it. If you are scent sensitive, it might be too much for you. I've been using it for about 2 weeks and I'm really noticing a difference in my skin. My skin has brightened and I can see dark spots starting to even out! I thought with it being an oil, it would cause me to break out, but it hasn't. I am extremely happy with this product and will buy it again. *I bought this product on my own. Just looking for something to help out my weird skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great oil. FOUL smell.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago and decided to use it this week. The oil is certainly really good for the hair hair but the smell is FOUL and impregnating. It smells like old car engine oil. It’s a shame because it’s really good for dry hair and leaves and amazing texture but not at the expense of smelling like I just came out from working all day in a body shop.
customer_reviews.author: O.M.

customer_reviews.title: Use for pregnancy skin.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this oil to keep my skin smooth during pregnancy. My cheeks got super dry and bumpy. I use this to take off my makeup. I also put it on before I apply my makeup. When my skin peels, I scrub with this oil and a Korean exfoliating glove. It's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for seborrheic dermatitis/eczema
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this oil nightly along with 100% aloe vera gel and my cerave night cream and my seborrheic dermatitis is now totally under control! This was the missing piece to my beauty routine, and works better for controlling seb/derm breakouts than any of my Rx. I get awful inflammation and flaking on my face and this wonderful product has been the answer to my prayers. Smells amazing, incredibly moisturizing, and again, worked literal magic on my sensitive skin. Love love loooove this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast Delivery!!
customer_reviews.text: I placed my order last Thursday night and received my oil (and Fenugreek powder) today. I used my oil tonight and I LUV the scent of roses it’s left in my hair. I have 3C-4A, low porosity natural hair and I purchased the oil because I’m looking to speed up growth AND retain length. I plan to post a review in a month or so as I expect to see results by then unless I see results sooner than that (from my mouth to God’s ears𗀂).
customer_reviews.author: LaDana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use after breast surgery on my scars......totally amazing. Not only is it helping reduce the appearance of the scar but helps healing the scar by keeping it hydrated. Very nice fresh scent.
customer_reviews.author: ALF

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent!
customer_reviews.text: Some people wrote down that the rose scent was too strong so I was worried. I am quite sensitive to strong, lingering scents but this one only had a weak rose-like, blossom-like scent and it went away (it does linger but faded quickly). I will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Student A

customer_reviews.title: See results in a week!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I bought it to put on my stomach for stretch marks after having a baby, and I use it as a face moisturizer as well. I have acne scars on my face, and this is the first product that has actually started to reduce the appearance of the scars! I saw results in just over one week. It does not leave that greasy feeling on the skin that other products leave, and it has a slight scent of rose water that is very pleasant. I will definitely keep this in my every day skin care routine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy for hair
customer_reviews.text: Usually i'm a lazy person to go and write a review fkr products. But for this oil.. i had to. Because its soo good and changed my hairs health .. started to see change from the first week. Before i used to have so dry hairs. Now i use it once a week (i put good amount of it) before shampoo. Trust me , i dont use conditioner and my hair stays soft and silky after shampoo where before it used to be soo dry. Cant tell yet if its helping to grow hair, but i can tell its healthy for hair. Maybe it wont bring back your hairs but it will help you keep what you have
customer_reviews.author: Zann

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR DRY AND AGED SKIN.  !
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE ROSE SMELL OF THIS PRODUCT. IT FEELS A LITTLE GREASY GOING ON FACE & NECK, BUT AFTER RUBBING ON NECK AND FACE FOR A FEW MINUTES IT GETS LESS OILY. I USE IT ON MY LEGS & FEET AND IT HAS DEFINITELY MADE A DIFFERENCE TO HELP DRYNESS. I NOTICED A DIFFERENCE IN MY SKIN, ESPECIALLY MY LEGS WHICH ARE ALWAYS EXPOSED TO THE FLORIDA SUN. THEY FEEL AND LOOK MUCH SOFTER AND SILKIER NOW. THANKS FOR A GREAT PRODUCT !
customer_reviews.author: snowbyrd2

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin from pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for eczema. Smells really good. First time having severely dry skin caused by pregnancy hormones. I was so lost with what to use. I tried so many different things before I stumbled upon this gem. It actually worked! And it's good for day & night time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeriberi93

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my order in a very timely manner. I am very satisfied with this product. I will update after week of use. ( Update - Have used Vitamin E Serum for over 3 months now. I have definitely seen an improvement in redness. I would recommend this to help moisturize and heal damaged and dry skin)
customer_reviews.author: J.Howard Whiteley

customer_reviews.text: my skin...is SO glowy and soft. I use this as a moisturizer at night because it’s so moisturizing. It’s not oily or greasy at all and it soaks into the skin amazingly. I noticed a slight difference in my acne scarring and I’m seeing that they have faded a little. Also my skin is usually way oily to begin with but now my skin is so hydrated, I don’t have so much oil throughout the day. If you like Rose scent, then you would like this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hines

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually using this for my nails and it works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: i recently started having a regular in-depth morning and nighttime skincare routine, but it left me with really dry and tight skin. i’ve tried multiple lotions/oils but i still had pretty rough dryness around my eyes, neck, and mouth. i stumbled across this and decided to give it a shot, and i’m glad i did because after two uses the dryness is pretty much gone. i just let this sit on my face for about 5-10 minutes before putting my normal moisturizer on top and it works great. the size of this won’t have me running out for awhile but once i hit the bottom i’ll definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Clears acne and moisturizes skin
customer_reviews.text: Overall loving this oil. I use it every morning and night after washing my face. I've been using it alone for my acne to see if it clears it and I've noticed that it is clearing my acne slowly and moisturizing my face at the same time. I like that it doesn't have a nutty smell but instead has a subtle sweet scent. Will continue to use it and probably will order another bottle once I finish my first bottle. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marielxcii

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality oil
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Vitamin E Jojoba Oil! Leven Rose is a pretty reputable brand, with quality products that smell amazing. This oil smells wonderful like a light floral scent, not too overpowering at all! I use this on my hands and cuticles, my hair, and my face to hydrate and give me a glow! The jojoba oil absorbs quickly into the skin and doesn't leave me with a greasy feel at all. Overall, I highly recommend this product and will repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Very nice oil-doesn’t clog pores
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle . I use it to take makeup off and it works great. It’s a nice medium viscosity for use as a moisturizer in northern winters when skin is drier. I really like the smell of it and the oil blends. I plan on purchasing the raspberry leaf oil to try as a daytime moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Spears

customer_reviews.title: Skin softening
customer_reviews.text: The scent of roses does not bother me. It is skins softening. I don’t see any other results. What I dislike is the drippiness and the mess. I wish the oils were in a thicker base or cream.
customer_reviews.author: W. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good serum!
customer_reviews.text: This serum kinda helped with my acne scars. It's very subtle. I mostly use this for my body and hair and it's made my skin very soft and hair too. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Too grease
customer_reviews.text: Just ok ,not too happy I personal think is too greasy my skin doesn’t absorb it like some other I keep trying I’ll see what happens
customer_reviews.author: edj2

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I’m honestly still waiting to see what this does for my skin. I was extremely hesitant to use this on my face because my face is already oily as it is so I thought adding more oil would make my face break out. It didn’t, it holds the moisture that’s for sure but that’s about it so I’m hoping within a few weeks I’ll notice a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, smells great, not overpowering, hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful, feels better. All my friends keep saying how glowing I look and this product is definitely contributing to that as well as other all natural products. Natural is the way to go ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Justine Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a video on how to grow your nails without them breaking, and the youtuber suggested Jojoba oil. She showed a bunch of brands however I went for Leven Rose since they ship, I think, internationally and I am so glad I did. Been using it for a little over a week now and, apart from the great spa-like smell, I can already see an improvement in the length of my nails and they have not chipped! I apply it on my nail bed (when not wearing nail polish) and in my cuticle (when wearing nail polish) bringing it all the way down to my first knuckle.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Abela

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizers skin and has helped with lines
customer_reviews.text: Really moisturize skin and makes it look younger and softer. Has helped with lines and wrinkles. I apply with ring finger after I add a little warm water to my face, it makes it easier to spread.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, not great...for me personally
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this product! Absolutely love it but it doesn’t absorb into my skin and smooth it as well as when I’ve tried organic coconut oil for some reason but I still use it because it smells nice :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Best EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this serum! Although I just received it a week ago, the few times I've used it; my skin feels so much more moisturized and happier than it did with just moisturizer! I have gauged ears, and this serum really helps to relieve chapped and dry skin as well as supple texture and a natural glow for my face after exfoliating.. I can't wait to order more. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Fox

customer_reviews.title: I recommend buying
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this product so far.. I use it on my face and my 9 month pregnant belly so far so good. And I also have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Celph Wealth

customer_reviews.title: using for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about four months and i absolutely love it! I initially was going to use it as just a makeup remover but then i also started using it as a after shower moisturizer. It made my skin soft and smooth. The smell is so nice not overpowering. I definitely recommend this and i will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally Nails!!
customer_reviews.text: I have onychoschizia. A condition that causes my nails to peel and be paper thin. Since using this product my nails have grown.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Lam

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This oil feels light, silky smooth, and smells AMAZING. I love my night time routine now. Great purchase, highly recommend and would definitely buy again. I received an email from the company shortly after I ordered this thanking me for my purchase and offering customer service as needed. Very nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality serum, no animal testing
customer_reviews.text: I like this serum. It seems like a quality product. I apply ever few days to my face, every night on my lips and nails. Very moisturizing. They do not test on animals either.
customer_reviews.author: Nev Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product although i have ordered other oils from company and they have worked well the vitamin e serum i do not like at all. I only used it once you it caused tingling. I returned the item for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Bella Reine

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy worth it Best Oil on the market Period
customer_reviews.text: Using this for hair growth... so many essential oils ...... cuts down me having to purchase oils and mix myself .... very very light weight and amazingggg so far.... Day 1 & counting
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. Leaves my skin soft wether I'm using it on my face or hands. Have noticed an improvement on my redness. I enjoy using this oil so much that I've started looking into the other highly rated products that Leven Rose offers and also bought another bottle of the jojoba oil as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Sachak

customer_reviews.title: Beats the cold weather in North Dakota!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the ND weather starts turning cold, I use oil to moisturize, and this product works great to combat the cold weather and helps my skin not to dry and flake. The scent is soft and rosy, as well. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great & Works Wonderfully 😊❣️
customer_reviews.text: Works Wonderfully ❣️It feels Nice on my Skin (I just had surgery on my foot🦶 So I’m putting in on the scar area), but it’s so silky and absorbing I using it in other spots Too😁!!️Love the lite rose sent!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with this oil!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I put this oil on my face I feel like I'm getting the spa treatment. It makes my skin feel nourished, smooth, and soft and it has a faint smell of roses. Does not clog pores and isn't sticky. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing serum!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing serum. It smells so good! It absorbs in to your skin. It is not as thick as an original oil. I have dry skin and this keeps my face moisturized for the entire day! Would highly recommend. Will definitely be buying more once mine runs out. The price for how much you get is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nav

customer_reviews.title: Nourishing
customer_reviews.text: I combine this oil with my oatmeal lotion for my legs. It helps my legs from itching after shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Jerae David

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of leven rose oils..this is no exception. Excellent Ingredients,smells wonderful and is works wonders on dry patches and all over use.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, works well. I purchased for my troublesome dry skin issues on my face. It absorbs quickly and easily. Hasn't clogged pores or caused break outs yet so that's good...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have many of Leven Rose products, I mix my own face and body oils. Love them, I've seen a difference in my face and body.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kenny

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Incredible!! Awesome! Fantastic product!! I use this on my extremely dry face twice daily and it has improved the texture, tone and over all appearance tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for moisturizing my skin after bathing, and I also use it on my nails, to prevent hangnails and strengthen my nails. I even use it on my hair when it becomes too dry or brittle in between shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: "rachael1"

customer_reviews.title: BEST VITAMIN E SERUM EVER
customer_reviews.text: This serum is fantastic as a moisturizer for your skin and for the hair. I use it at night for the tip of my hair, since I have very dry hair and in the morning, my hair is soft and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: guillermo valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Absorb quickly. Can add to other pills. Works great if use a couple drops on my ends of my hair. I also add it to my Eucerin lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Purn3l!$

customer_reviews.title: Love this serum!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vitamin e serum I have tried so far. The scent is amazing. I mixed this with my vitamin c serum with no issues. They blend just perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TrustedAmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered from Leven Rose several times... customer service the BEST!!!! product too.
customer_reviews.author: PromisesK

customer_reviews.title: Loooive this oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use it at night time after cleansing my face &showering. It moisturizes very well and I sleep in it. Makes my skin feel so much softer.Will be buying more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Manaia Delilah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using the Vitamin E Serum by Leven Rose and love it. I haven't had it too long but it's already replaced my moisturizer. I've used it on my face and chest but plan to try the other product suggestions as well. A little goes a long way! Mine has a lovely rose scent which I like but I believe it comes unscented too.
customer_reviews.author: With

customer_reviews.title: Love! Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Very soothing and good for sensitive skin. Doesn’t make me break out. I use this on my hair face and body it’s amazing and smells like roses
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Mumy

customer_reviews.title: Must have!! :)
customer_reviews.text: I got it yesterday, used it at night & I absolutely love it already! It makes me feel so fresh.. one thing though, if you’re gonna wear it under makeup make sure the skin already absorbed it all, if not the foundation won’t apply good! (At least for me it didn’t :/ ) Hope everyone loves it as much as me!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Daiana

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: I have been using several of their products and love them all. It's all I'm using for my face. The quality is amazing, always fast delivery, excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: I.H.

customer_reviews.title: using as a serum before a DIY moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using now for a few weeks. At first I thought it would be too heavy especially with summer coming but my face is actually clearer and feels better with a nicer texture so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Tiedt

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have Dermatitis after using this pil with a mixture of other things. I no longer have to use my medicine and haven't had a break out in months.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: = excellent
customer_reviews.text: I used to make my own,, until I found this blend = I love it!
customer_reviews.author: cecile Poletti

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: It smells like rose oil omg! And it gives me this natural glow and certain puffiness right when you wear it. It’s so nice. I use it on my whole body and hair too and it actually softens my hair. I have south Asian hair so it doesn’t get soft easiltnwith predicts, but this one WOW
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Love this Serum
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery & needed something for the scars. Love the scent. It really worked to help reduce the scar tissues. I have recommended this to many others.
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: YAy for this!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an oil that left me moisturized and not oily. This one is it. Do yourself a favor. Ur skin glows. Skip the expensive brands that just have stupid chemicals in them and fancy packaging and marketing... ur skin just needs natural stuff.
customer_reviews.author: QueenPicky

customer_reviews.title: Moust
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of the Vitamin E serum but it won't be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out so bad all over my face
customer_reviews.text: Made me break out so bad all over my face. I bought it because it states that vitamin e helps with acne but it only made mine worse. Once I stopped using it the acne has been slowly getting better. I’ve never had acne this bad until I starting using this serum.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Menefee

customer_reviews.title: Fighting wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I mix it with my vitamin C serum for best results
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells horrible; powerful rose smell, I guess, cannot stand it; returned upon receipt. May work for some, don't know, won't try it because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: sandybb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil and I'm glad I chose to purchase it. It has an amazing aroma but not too strong. I use this as a moisturizer for my face and a little on my hair. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkole Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this as something I wanted to add to a homemade body wash. I loved how that turned out. And THEN I started using it as a moisturizer AM and PM. I LOVE it! I feel soft and moisturized all day, but I have sensitive, dry skin on my face. So I wouldn't recommend it for oily skin AM & PM. Maybe just PM.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle V

customer_reviews.title: Soooo nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I’ve been a fan of jojoba for ages and this oil is especially nice. I love the mix. Also, the customer service is impressive and communicative
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Like Magic.
customer_reviews.text: I'm stunned at how effective this stuff is. I use it every day now, feels great, smells great, and gives amazing results on hair and skin.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mitchum

customer_reviews.title: good for skin, hair, and nails
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about a week and have added this to my daily routine for moisturizing. It is refreshing and leaves the skin revitalized. I'm happy with this purchase and would order again. One thing i'd like to know and that you can improve is adding an ingredients section on the bottle or the supplement facts that'd be helpful for me and other customers. Otherwise, so far so good. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Luvleen D

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service and great product! I was a little nervous to use this on my face as I have very sensitive skin but this stuff is great! It goes on and leaves a nice clean feel, is very moisturizing and light. I will definitely be buying again and I recommend this to anyone looking for moisture without clogged pores.
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: Super soft skin. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I have been using this oil mixing it with my lotion and my skin is very smooth. My skin is sensitive and kind of on the dry side usually so I am happy this product is 100% natural but still turned my skin into a super soft hydrated healthy skin. And the smell is so pleasant. I love this oil. I am ordering more for sure !!!!
customer_reviews.author: e. harris

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So far I have loved everything from Leven Rose. This Vitamin E oil is no exception. It smells divine and moisturizes like a dream. I have suuuuuper dry skin and this might be the thing I have tried that has actually helped the most.
customer_reviews.author: vt home

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: Using this as my stretch marks oil, been using it since 9 weeks pregnant. Now 18 weeks and still going great
customer_reviews.author: Gina Lafleur

customer_reviews.title: Too many additives. Just dried my nails out
customer_reviews.text: I got this to moisturize my nails and promote nail growth, but it has so many additives that is dried my nails out so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I am very happy. The scent is just right, not overwhelming. I’ve been using it on my hair and it is just what I needed with my fly away curls. I also plan on using this oil in a recipe for making my own body lotion and conditioner. I highly recommend this product and this company!
customer_reviews.author: Tina N

product_meta.title: Vitamin E Serum by Leven Rose 100% Pure Organic All Natural Face, Dry Skin & Body Moisturizer Treatment, Hair & Nail Growth Oil, Pure Makeup Remover, Acne Cleansing Oil Large 4 oz
product_meta.description:
PURE ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS: 100% Pure Organic Vitamin E (from natural wheat germ), Jojoba Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Argan Oil, premium Prickly Pear Cactus Oil, Sea Buckthorn Seed Oil, Avocado Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Fractionated Coconut Oil & Rose Essential Oil 
Nutrient dense antioxidants heal blemishes, chapped dry skin, rashes, beard care, stretch marks, sun spot damage, plus is a makeup remover, acne infection treatment & more. 
NAIL GROWER & CUTICLE HEALER - Have brittle, yellow, short nails? Want stronger, thicker, brighter nails and smooth cuticles? Apply this oil daily to nail beds and cuticles for envy-worthy hands and nails! 
ANTI-AGING MAXIMUM MOISTURE SKIN HEALER - Fight free radicals, the signs of aging, dark spots, sun spots, age spots, and uneven skin tone with this potent natural acne fighter and toner. 
MADE IN THE USA - Absorbs into the skin with no additives or parabens and non-GMO for maximum healing anti-inflammatory benefits. 
GREAT FOR HAIR, SKIN & NAILS - Use to help treat acne, cysts, blisters, psoriasis, rosacea, eczema, candidiasis, rashes, keratosis, keloid dermatitis, calluses, corns, shingles, sunburn and more. 
PRESERVE YOUR ORGANIC OIL - Dark amber bottle with glass dropper extends shelf life as oils are light sensitive & must be stored in dark amber bottles to protect organics from oxidation. 
100% Natural
Chemical Free
Soy Free
Anti-Aging
Ultra Hydrating

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - If you don’t love it, we’ll refund it! Leven Rose stands by their products.
feature_bullets: GROW STRONG NAILS - Cold pressed golden Jojoba + Vitamin E hand & nail conditioner helps grow longer & thicker nails
ULTRA HYDRATING + DEEP CLEANSING Therapeutic Grade Skin Therapy Oil for scalp massage + acne healing facial toner
INTENSE HEALING + Sweet Almond, Argan, Prickly Pear Cactus, Sea Buckthorn Oil, Avocado, Apricot, Coconut & Rose Oil
COLD-PRESSED SOY FREE CARRIER OIL for Essential Oils - Chemical, Alcohol, Filler & GMO FREE in a dark glass bottle
HELPS HEAL itchy skin, brittle yellow nails, cuticles, wrinkles, scars, psoriasis, rosacea, eczema & keratosis
